name: Departed (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Departed (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Carson Gilford and Miles Isgrig

Departed is a narrative based story game where you and your beloved dog  Smokey explore an island and discover why you are there. You must find ancient texts, ruins, and spirits as well as find artifacts.

To move - up,down,left,right arrow keys

To advance dialogue - spacebar
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
